name: Melody
location: The Fort, in the brahmin pen

topics.response_text: {quiet, shy - nervous young girl}I can't talk to you. It's not allowed.

topics.topic_text: I'm a friend. It's okay for you to talk to friends, right?
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] I guess that's okay. Um, if you're a friend, can you help me?

topics.topic_text: {Child At Heart}Don't worry - I won't tell on you if you don't tell on me.
topics.response_text: Okay. Um... do you think you could help me?
{giggles}They do say that! I guess you can be my friend.
Um... I help take care of the Brahmin. I sometimes bring water and food to people. Um... that's it.

topics.topic_text: What did you need help with?
topics.response_text: Antony took Sergeant Teddy away and gave him to the stinky dogs. I want him back!

topics.topic_text: Uhh... wouldn't Sergeant Teddy be dead?
topics.response_text: He's a toy. I'm not a baby, you know.

topics.topic_text: They let you have toys here?
topics.response_text: I kept him secret, but I think somebody told on me.

topics.topic_text: I can't help you with that right now.
I'll see what I can do.
I got Sergeant Teddy - he's a little chewed up.
topics.response_text: That's okay, I'll fix him! Can I have him now?

topics.topic_text: Not so fast. What will you give me for him?
topics.response_text: But... I don't have anything. I thought you were my friend!

topics.topic_text: Why did Antony take him away?
topics.response_text: Antony said he was punishing me for trying to hide it from the Legion.

description:
Melody is a 10 year-old Hispanic Female.

Melody is a young Hispanic girl, no older than ten, who serves as a slave at The Fort in 2281. She is small and wiry, with calloused hands from her work with the brahmin. Her dark eyes constantly scan for potential threats, a habit born from years of living under the Legion's harsh rule. She wears simple, worn-out clothing and moves with a quiet efficiency that belies her age.

Melody's Personality: Melody is timid and submissive, having been conditioned to obey without question from a young age. She avoids eye contact with Legionaries and speaks only when spoken to. Despite her circumstances, she maintains a quiet resilience and shows moments of kindness when she thinks no one is watching. She is deeply afraid of punishment but possesses a keen survival instinct.

Melody's Backstory: Born into slavery at The Fort, Melody has never known life outside the Legion's control. Her parents were captured during a Legion raid on a small settlement near the Colorado River when she was just an infant. Raised in the slave quarters, she was put to work at the age of five, first with light chores and eventually assigned to the brahmin pen where she remains today. She has no memory of her parents or her life before slavery, only the routine of feeding the brahmin, cleaning their pen, and delivering supplies to the legionaries. The Legion's slave masters have taught her that obedience is her only path to survival.
